Verses: 1 andha Naatkalile Thiralaana Janangal Koodivandhirukkaiyil, Avargal Saappidugiradharku Ondrumillaadhapodhu, Yesu Thammudaiya Seesharai Azhaiththu:
2 janangalukkaagap Paridhabikkiren, Ivargal Ippozhudhu Ennidaththil Thangiyirundha Moondru Naalaai Saappida Ondrumillaadhirukkiraargal;
3 ivargalil Silar Dhooraththilirundhu Vandhavargalaagaiyaal, Naan Ivargalaip Pattiniyaai Veettirku Anuppivittaal Vazhiyil Sorndhu Povaargale Endraar.
4 adharku Avarudaiya Seeshargal: Indha Vanaandharaththile Oruvan Engeyirundhu Appangalaik Konduvandhu Iththanai Pergalaith Thirupthiyaakkakkoodum Endraargal.
5 adharku Avar: Ungalidaththil Eththanai Appangal Undu Endru Kettaar. Avargal: Ezhu Appangal Undu Endraargal.

6 appozhudhu Avar Janangalaith Tharaiyile Pandhiyirukkak Kattalaiyittu, Andha Ezhu Appangalaiyum Eduththu, Sthoththiram Panni, Pittu, Avargalukkup Parimaarumpadi Seeshargalidaththil Koduththaar; Avargal Janangalukkup Parimaarinaargal.
7 sila Siru Meengalum Avargalidaththil Irundhadhu; Avar Avaigalaiyum Aaseervadhiththu Avargalukkup Parimaarumpadi Sonnaar.
8 avargal Saappittuth Thirupthiyadaindhaargal; Meedhiyaana Thunikkaigalai Ezhu Koodai Niraiya Eduththaargal.
9 saappittavargal Erakkuraiya Naalaayiram Peraayirundhaargal. Pinbu Avar Avargalai Anuppivittaar.
10 udane Avar Thammudaiya Seesharodekoodap Padavil Eri, Thalmanooththaavin Ellaigalil Vandhaar.
11 appozhudhu Pariseyar Vandhu Avarode Tharkkikkaththodangi, Avarai Sodhikkumpadi, Vaanaththilirundhu Oru Adaiyaalaththaik Kaanbikkavendum Endru Kettaargal.

12 avar Thammudaiya Aaviyil Perumoochchuvittu: Indha Sandhadhiyaar Adaiyaalam Thedugiradhenna? Indha Sandhadhiyaarukku Oru Adaiyaalamum Kodukkappaduvadhillaiyendru Meyyaagave Ungalukku Sollugiren Endru Solli,
13 avargalai Vittu Marupadiyum Padavil Eri, Akkaraikkup Ponaar.
14 seeshargal Appangalaik Konduvara Marandhuponaargal; Padavile Avargalidaththil Oru Appamaaththiram Irundhadhu.
15 avar Avargalai Nokki: Neengal Pariseyarudaiya Puliththamaavaikkuriththum Erodhin Puliththamaavaikkuriththum Echcharikkaiyaayirungal Endru Karpiththaar.
16 adharku Avargal: Nammidaththil Appangal Illaadhapadiyaal Ippadi Sollugiraar Endru Thangalukkulle Yosanaipannikkondaargal.

17 yesu Adhai Arindhu, Avargalai Nokki: Ungalidaththil Appangal Illaadhapadiyinaal Neengal Yosanaipannugiradhenna? Innum Sindhiyaamalum Unaraamalum Irukkireergalaa? Innum Ungal Irudhayam Kadinamaayirukkiradhaa?
18 ungalukku Kangalirundhum Kaanaadhirukkireergalaa? Kaadhugalirundhum Kelaadhirukkireergalaa? Ninaivukooraamalumirukkireergalaa?
19 naan Aindhu Appangalai Aiyaayiram Perukkup Pangittapodhu, Meedhiyaana Thunikkaigalai Eththanai Koodai Niraiya Eduththeergal Endru Kettaar. Pannirandu Endraargal.
20 naan Ezhu Appangalai Naalaayiram Perukkup Pangittapodhu, Meedhiyaana Thunikkaigalai Eththanai Koodai Niraiya Eduththeergal Endru Kettaar. Ezhu Endraargal.
21 appadiyaanaal, Neengal Unaraadhirukkiradhu Eppadi Endraar.
22 pinbu Avar Pedhsaayidhaa Oorukku Vandhaar; Appozhudhu Oru Kurudanai Avaridaththil Konduvandhu, Avanaith Thodumpadi Avarai Vendikkondaargal.
23 avar Kurudanudaiya Kaiyaippidiththu, Avanaik Giraamaththukku Veliye Azhaiththukkondupoi, Avan Kangalil Umizhndhu, Avanmel Kaigalai Vaiththu Edhaiyaagilum Kaangiraayaa Endru Kettaar.
24 avan Erittuppaarththu: Nadakkira Manusharai Marangalaippol Kaangiren Endraan.
25 pinbu Avar Marupadiyum Avan Kangalinmel Kaigalai Vaiththu, Avanai Erittuppaarkkumpadi Seydhaar; Appozhudhu Avan Sosthamadaindhu, Yaavaraiyum Thelivaaik Kandaan.
26 pinbu Avar Avanai Nokki: Nee Giraamaththil Piravesiyaamalum, Giraamaththil Idhai Oruvarukkum Sollaamalum, Iru Endru Solli, Avanai Veettirku Anuppivittaar.

27 pinbu, Yesuvum Avarudaiya Seeshargalum Purappattu, Pilippuch Sechariyaa Pattanaththaich Serndha Giraamangalukkup Ponaargal. Vazhiyile Avar Thammudaiya Seeshargalai Nokki: Janangal Ennai Yaar Endru Sollugiraargal Endru Kettaar.
28 adharku Avargal: Silar Ummai Yovaansnaanan Endrum, Silar Eliyaa Endrum, Veru Silar Theerkkadharisigalil Oruvar Endrum Sollugiraargal Endraargal.
29 appozhudhu Avar: Neengal Ennai Yaarendru Sollugireergal Endru Kettaar. Pedhuru Piradhiyuththaramaaga: Neer Kiristhu Endraan.
30 appozhudhu, Thammaikkuriththu Oruvarukkum Sollaadhapadikku Avargalukku Urudhiyaaik Kattalaiyittaar.

31 allaamalum, Manushakumaaran Palapaadugal Pattu, Moopparaalum Piradhaana Aasaariyaraalum Vedhapaaragaraalum Aagaadhavanendru Thallappattu, Kollappattu, Moondru Naalaikkuppinbu Uyirththezhundhirukkavendiyadhendru Avargalukkup Podhikkaththodanginaar.
32 indha Vaarththaiyai Avar Dhaaraalamaaga Sonnaar. Appozhudhu, Pedhuru Avaraith Thaniye Azhaiththukkondupoi, Avaraik Kadindhukollath Thodanginaan.

33 avar Thirumbith Thammudaiya Seesharaip Paarththu, Pedhuruvai Nokki: Enakkup Pinnaagappo, Saaththaane, Nee Dhevanukketravaigalai Sindhiyaamal Manusharukku Etravaigalai Sindhikkiraai Endru Solli Avanaik Kadindhukondaar.

34 pinbu, Avar Janangalaiyum Thammudaiya Seeshargalaiyum Thammidaththil Azhaiththu: Oruvan En Pinne Vara Virumbinaal, Avan Thannaiththaan Veruththu, Than Siluvaiyai Eduththukkondu Ennaip Pinbatrakkadavan.
35 than Jeevanai Ratchikka Virumpugiravan Adhai Izhandhupovaan, Ennimiththamaagavum Suviseshaththinimiththamaagavum Than Jeevanai Izhandhu Pogiravan Adhai Ratchiththukkolluvaan.
36 manushan Ulagam Muzhuvadhaiyum Aadhaayappaduththikkondaalum, Than Jeevanai Nashtappaduththinaal Avanukku Laabam Enna?
37 manushan Than Jeevanukku Eedaaga Ennaththaik Koduppaan?

38 aadhalaal Vibasaaramum Paavamumulla Indha Sandhadhiyil Ennaikkuriththum En Vaarththaigalaikkuriththum Evan Vetkappaduvaano, Avanaikkuriththu Manushakumaaranum Thamadhu Pidhaavin Magimai Porundhinavaraaip Parisuththa Thoodhargalodunkooda Varumpodhu Vetkappaduvaar Endraar.
